price: 3. Diggah nanu tirtô gitaa kee makô gita kaah baxxaqisneh moomintuy faatita akkee kee korostay yangadde akke yakke immay.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
